entry.summary:
Author: That_bitch_without_a_life

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 22,878Chapters: 6/14Kudos: 25

Summary: It’s been about 5 months since she had talked to Lena. It’s been seven months since the covid outbreak. A lot has certainly changed. She's been managing being Superwoman while having three new house guests and she swears Krypto is getting fatter. If you ask kara she'll blame Chimney for feeding him scraps. Most importantly, Maddie's almost done with her pregnancy. TLDR: this is a female buck fic if she was supergirl, just trust the process.

entry.title: Second Chances
entry.summary:
Author: starylighting

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 570,894Chapters: 62/?Kudos: 77

Summary: Bobby and Athena are just two people trying to put their lives back together while figuring out how to co-parent. What starts as a complicated plan to foster kids in need slowly turns into something much deeper. Through the ups and downs of heartbreak, healing, and raising children who’ve been through so much, they find strength in each other. Over time, their partnership grows into love, and together, they build a story about family, trust, and second chances.

entry.title: Evergrowing
entry.summary:
Author: starylighting

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 365,835Chapters: 55/?Kudos: 24

Summary: Athena and Bobby are learning that parenting doesn’t end when the kids turn eighteen. With three grown children and two still at home, Bobby and Athena find themselves navigating new challenges at every stage of life. Each child carries their own struggles, some spoken and some hidden, but together the family works through the ups and downs with love, patience, and resilience. At the heart of it all, they’re reminded that family is a bond that grows, shifts, and deepens, no matter how old the kids get.

entry.title: The Price of Power
entry.summary:
Author: starylighting

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 219,531Chapters: 38/?Kudos: 22

Summary: Athena Carter and Bobby Nash couldn’t be more different. She’s the disciplined “good girl” with her future mapped out, while he’s the dangerous bad boy with one foot in college and the other in the streets. When their worlds start to collide, what begins as a bitter rivalry quickly sparks into something deeper neither of them can ignore. But falling for Bobby means stepping into a world Athena never imagined, one ruled by loyalty and violence. That tested everything she thought she knew about herself. As sparks turn to fire, Athena must decide if love is worth the risk of losing everything.

entry.title: Into You
entry.summary:
Author: PineWitch

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 10,885Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 26

Summary: Buck would be returning to work today, after spending almost a month in Pennsylvania. Eddie knew this was making him a little unsettled. It was odd not seeing Buck for so long. He already seemed too settled into his routine with Christopher, and Eddie was ready to have that back.He had barely set down the coffee pot when he heard a commotion downstairs. Eddie approached the glass railing to see Buck walking among the engines – his shoulders wet from a light summer drizzle, smile on his face while he greeted other co-workers. His hair was longer than the last time they saw each other. And he had curls.Eddie almost dropped the coffee.   If you want to read Eddie pining hopelessly over Buck, that's the fic.

entry.title: one single glimpse of relief
entry.summary:
Author: greyspilot

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 32,003Chapters: 7/20Kudos: 95

Summary: "What if I never get better? What if I always feel like this?" Buck finally looks back up at him, vulnerability and compassion clear on his too-expressive face. "I don't know," he says honestly. "I don't…" he shudders, gives a tiny shrug of his shoulders and tries again. "I don't have an answer for that, man. It's been seven months for me and I still feel…like this." "Like what?" Buck just shrugs again, then mumbles, "Not myself." And Eddie doesn't know what to say to that either, because this is the only version of Buck he's ever known.Or: Buck and Eddie meet at grief group.

entry.title: Extended Family In High Places
entry.summary:
Author: centeast

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 73,486Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 328

Summary: Eddie Diaz has just started at the 118 and is cousins to Alex and June Claremont Diaz, also known as the First Son of the United States and First Daughter of the United States. Eddie's relationship with his cousins are introduced to the 118 early on. Buck and Eddie's relationship grows throughout and an event in DC brings them together. Buck is welcomed into the extended family and everyone realizes they're regular people in high profile jobs. Starts around 911 Season 2 and follows the series as best we can. We'll also be following the RWRB book more than the movie, but some elements from the movie may slip in depending on the situation. This was inspired by our mutual adoration of 911 and Red, White and Royal Blue. Fans of 911 who are not aware of RWRB, we highly recommend reading the book and watching the movie. It is a cute rom-com book and the movie is good, too. And those RWRB fans, who do not know of 911, check it out! 6 seasons and still going strong. Although, we both have differing reasons as to why we watch. But you can blame Centeast for the RWRB fandom adoration! She introduced SapphireEJ when the book first came out!

entry.title: If You Are
entry.summary:
Author: Franks34

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,773Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 83

Summary: Eddie is right there beside him, shoulder brushing Buck's, chatting with one of the women from the 113. Buck joins in the second Christopher's name comes up. Eddie hides a smile behind a swig from his bottle and lets him take the lead — no one knows better than him how Buck gets when Chris is mentioned. So Buck talks away, nods along, pulls out his phone to show pictures of the three of them. "Oh wow," the woman says. "That's so great. Such a sweet family. How long have you two been–?" "We're not together!" Buck blurts out at the exact same moment Eddie says, "Eight years", earning them both a confused look. Buck rushes to clarify. "We work together. We've worked together for eight years, but we're not together. I mean– not a couple." His gesticulation is way too expressive in that nervous manner. "Obviously. That would be ridiculous."orBuddie get mistaken for a couple at Nashville games. Buck absolutely can't have that. People should stop assuming. After all, he can't be in love with his straight best friend.The stright best friend has his own thoughts about the matter.

entry.title: Two More Little Lines
entry.summary:
Author: WellHelloHello

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 31,470Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 66

Summary: As soon as she got home she did all four tests and set a timer on her phone. She paced around, too anxious to stand still, waiting for the results. It wasn’t that she was scared because she didn’t want a kid, she was scared because she might have to seriously sit down and make some extremely difficult decisions. Eventually the timer went so she walked over to the bathroom counter, looking down at all four tests. Positive. There were four positives. or Buck's first pregnancy hadn't been the smoothest, but number two is far, far worse.

entry.title: You Let Me Stand There When You Were Afraid
entry.summary:
Author: buckmeetsboy

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 42,453Chapters: 5/20Kudos: 73

Summary: Eddie Diaz is very good at keeping things contained: his routines, his boundaries, his heart. Evan Buckley has never been good at pretending anything doesn’t matter. What starts as a simple favor turns into shared coffees, borrowed space, and a kind of closeness that feels dangerously easy. It’s supposed to be fake.
